articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Art Squads
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Art Squads
Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed an art performance given by the art squad of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill and the itinerant art squad of the Pyongyang Textile Mill.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers of diverse genres as chorus "The General Is Our Father", dialogic poem "We Sing of the Loving Care Shown by the Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu", female chorus and pangchang "Recollecting the Birthplace," female chorus "Oriole Chirps in Compound of Our Mill", agitation and story-telling "There is 'Pueblo' in Front of the Gate to Our Mill", drum beating and singing in chorus "Our Country Is Witnessing Changes", male quintet  and chorus "Do Proper, the Era of the Workers' Party" and poem and chorus "Let Us Dash Ahead toward a Thriving Nation". 
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of their happiness and pride of dynamically making a breakthrough towards building an economic power as strong vanguard unit of the revolution under the loving care of Kim Jong Il and powerfully demonstrated the militant spirit of the heroic working class of Korea dashing ahead like the wind toward the eminence of a thriving nation full of faith in sure victory and optimism.
					
					 They truthfully represented the proud appearance of new culture of the working class born in the era of Songun through the performance replete with revolutionary enthusiasm and militant spirit.
					
					  He acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the performers and audience and congratulated them on their successful performance. He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the members of the above-said art squads presented a splendid performance flawless in ideological contents and artistry with art works of great cognitive and educational value as they truthfully represented their life. He extended high appreciation and thanks to them for their successful performance. 
					
					 All the numbers put on the stage fully reflect the unshakable faith, revolutionary optimism and transparent spiritual world of the Korean working class pushing ahead the socialist cause of Juche in the van while strictly adhering to the working class principle, undeterred by any storm and stress, he said, adding that the popular art now in full bloom among the workers of the mills serves as an example of new noble culture of the working class in the Songun era based on the revolutionary soldier culture.
					
					 He advanced important tasks that would serve as guidelines for intensifying the popular cultural and art activities. He expressed great expectation and conviction that the working class in the DPRK would bring about uninterrupted leap forward and innovations in production and construction in the future, too, sounding the advance for a great surge and beating drums of the revolution. 
					
					Among the audience were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first deputy director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, KPA General U Tong Chuk, member of the NDC of the DPRK, and other commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs, Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui, Thae Jong Su and Kim Yang Gon and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee and leading officials of the mills concerned and servicepersons.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets AFC Chairman
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chairman of AFC
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Mohamed Hammam Saad Al-Abdulla, chairman of the Asian Football Confederation, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: New Lodging Place Built for National Football Team
articles.content:
New Training Camp Built for National Football Team 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A new training camp with 60 beds has been built for the national football team of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea under the FIFA Goal Project.
					It, with a floor space of more than 2,100 square meters, has bedrooms, dining halls, baths, swimming pool, a video room, etc.
					
					 The opening ceremony took place on Monday. Present there were Minister of Trade Ri Ryong Nam who is also chairman of the DPRK Football Association, President of the Asian Football Confederation Mohamed Hammam S. Al-Abdulla and others.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration Marked
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- An opening ceremony of a photo exhibition and film week was held at Taedongmun Cinema on Monday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the DPRK-Russia joint declaration.
					Displayed at the venue of the ceremony were photos showing General Secretary Kim Jong Il meeting Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, ex-president of Russia, and visiting Russia and those introducing it.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the committee who is chairwoman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, officials concerned, working people in the city and Alexander Matsegora, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Russian embassy here, and its staff members.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 The speakers said that the publication of the historic DPRK-Russia joint declaration marked an important occasion in boosting the traditional friendly ties between the two countries.
					
					 They referred to the fact that several meetings between Kim Jong Il and Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin laid a solid foundation for developing the bilateral relations onto a new higher stage.
					
					 They expressed belief that the photo exhibition and film week would make contribution to consolidating the friendly ties between the peoples of the DPRK and Russia.
					
					 The participants went round the photos on display and watched Korean documentary film "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Meets Putin, President of the Russian Federation".

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Chinese Academy of Sciences led by Vice President Shi Erwei arrived here on Monday by air.

articles.title: Football Matches between DPRK and China Held
articles.content:
Football Matches between DPRK and China Held
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Football matches between the under-19 national teams of the DPRK and China were held at Yanggakdo Football Stadium on July 15 and 18.
					 The DPRK team defeated the guest team 2:1 and 6:2.
					
					 Both of the teams will participate in the 2010 AFC under-19 Soccer Championship to be held in China in October.
					
					 The DPRK, together with Iraq, Uzbekistan and Bahrain, belongs to group B.
					
					 Earlier, the Chinese team had a match with the Mangyongbong team of the DPRK on July 12.
					
					 The latter won the match 2:1.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 88 Off Press
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 88 Off Press
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Vol. 88, a library of the immortal Juche idea, which systematically and comprehensively deals with his works in a chronological order.
					 The book contains 42 works of President Kim Il Sung including his historical speeches, conclusions and talks between January and December, Juche 78 (1989).
					
					 The works deal with his outstanding ideas, theories and policies which serve as guidelines in the struggle to fully display the advantages of the system of the DPRK by dynamically stepping up the movement of the grand socialist advance, and realize the reunification of the country and global independence.
					
					 Works including "Let Us Accelerate Socialist Construction with National Pride and Revolutionary Self-Confidence" and "On Thoroughly Implementing the Economic Tasks to Improve the Standard of People's Living" clarify the validity and vitality of the basic line of socialist economic construction put forward by the WPK, tasks and ways to successfully carry it out and tasks to be fulfilled to improve the standard of people's living while accelerating socialist economic construction.
					
					 He put forward principled issues in intensifying education in  revolutionary traditions in such works as "Education through the Trees Bearing Slogans and Revolutionary Sites and Relics Should Be Intensified" and "Talk with Officials While Looking round the Ssuksom Revolutionary Site".
					
					 There are also works which expound the need to spruce up the Majon and Taesongsan Pleasure Parks and Mt. Kuwol, prevent pollution and improve supply service for inhabitants so as to provide better conditions for cultural recreation and living to the Korean people.
					
					 Also carried in the book are works giving correct answers to theoretical and practical issues arising in carrying out the Korean revolution and realizing the human cause of independence including the issue of developing the movement of Koreans in Japan, the issue of frustrating the moves of separatists for "two Koreas" and achieving national reunification as early as possible and the issue of intensifying friendship and solidarity with different countries of the world.

articles.title: New Documentary Film Produced
articles.content:
New Documentary Film Produced
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The Korean Documentary and Science Film Studio recently produced documentary film "Legend of Loving Care and Belief Associated with Juche Iron".
					 The film impressively depicts the undying feats performed by the peerlessly great men in opening up a new history of the Juche-oriented metallurgical industry by wisely leading the work to complete Korean style iron and steel making method, an important event in the world metallurgical field.
					
					 Recorded in the film are historic data dealing with the great efforts exerted by President Kim Il Sung for the completion of the Korean style iron making method till the last moments of his great life. He used to say that those following the Juche idea must make Juche iron.
					
					 The film includes scenes showing General Secretary Kim Jong Il visiting the Songjin Steel Complex in March Juche 87 (1998) to kindle the torch of Songgang and those showing that he led step by step the workers of the complex to complete the Juche iron production system, thereby bringing the desire of Kim Il Sung into reality in this land.

articles.title: DPRK Hit by Heavy Rains
articles.content:
DPRK Hit by Heavy Rains
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Many areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have been hit by heavy rains caused by a subtropical anticyclone over the northwest Pacific and a low atmospheric pressure over the central part of the West Sea of Korea. 
					 According to information available from 12 a.m. of July 16 to 9 a.m. of July 19, the precipitation was 332mm in Jangphung, 287mm in Kaesong, 274mm in Phangyo, 252mm in Kaephung, 251mm in Sepho, 243mm in Nyongbyon, 239mm in Sinphyong, 236mm in Pukchang, 227mm in Koksan, 226mm in Maengsan, 204mm in Ichon and 201mm in Nyongwon.
					
					 More than 100 millimeters of rain poured on some 70 areas of Pyongyang, Nampho City, North and South Phyongan, North and South Hwanghae, Kangwon, Jagang and South Hamgyong Provinces.
					
					 50-70 millimeters of rainfall were observed in Kophung County of Jagang Province between 3 p.m. and 6 p.m. of July 17, Nampho between 6 a.m. and 9 a.m. of July 18 and Phyongwon, Sukchon, Sunchon, Kaechon and Jungsan of South Phyongan Province and Unchon and Songhwa of South Hwanghae Province from 9 a.m. to 12 a.m. of July 18.

articles.title: Summer Food
articles.content:
Summer Food 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The hottest period of summer (from mid-July to mid-August) has begun in Korea.
					 The Korean people often drink mineral water and take health food to stand heat in this period.  
					
					 Kangso, Sambang, Okhodong and other mineral waters are in good demand.
					
					 Such food as tangogi soup, young chicken broth with insam, pepper-pot chopped beef soup, hot rice and red-bean porridge, boiled barley and rice served with onion soup are popular in the same period.
					
					 In particular tangogi soup is easy of digestion and helpful in improving health, preventing diseases and standing heat.
					
					 A large number of people spend midsummer in spas, rest homes, sanatoria and camps. Restaurants specializing in national food are fully booked in the hottest days.

articles.title: 6.15 North Side Flays S. Korea's Suppression of Progressive Forces
articles.content:
6.15 North Side Flays S. Korea's Suppression of Progressive Forces
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement Monday bitterly denouncing the south Korean puppet group's unprecedented frantic suppression of progressive democratic forces including pro-reunification movement organizations as an outright challenge to the desire and wish of south Koreans for the implementation of the declaration, democracy and independent reunification as well as a fascist action to prop up the dictatorial regime.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The puppet group is greatly upset by its crushing defeat in the "elections to local self-governing bodies" and the advance of progressive democratic forces including pro-reunification movement forces that has become dynamic in its wake. It is, therefore, working with bloodshot eyes to suppress them and step up its moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK in a bid to ensure "stable power" in the latter half of its office and the "Grand National Party's" stay in power. Those concerned of progressive pro-reunification movement organizations had legitimate working contacts with the DPRK after getting the approval of the authorities of the preceding regime. But the Lee Myung Bak group is treating them as criminals after the lapse of several years under false charges that they engaged in "secret maneuvers" at the "instructions" of someone. This proves how mad the group has become in suppression.
					
					 The puppet forces' reckless suppression reduced south Korea to a tundra of democracy in which elementary rights to see, listen and speak, to say nothing of having contacts with fellow countrymen, have been ruthlessly trampled down.
					
					 The puppet forces' frantic clampdown on progressive democratic forces is nothing but the last-ditch efforts of those at their death-beds due to the domestic and foreign policy failures, the collapse of the north-south relations and "ruling" crisis.
					
					 The more frantically the group of traitors kicks up the repressive campaign, contrary to the mind-set of people, the fiercer resistance it will meet from south Koreans and all other Koreans.
					
					 The puppet conservative group had better immediately stop the dastardly fascist suppression of the Solidarity for Progress and all other pro-reunification progressive democratic forces involving south Koreans from all walks of life.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Urged to Confess Truth about "Cheonan" Case
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Urged to Confess Truth about "Cheonan" Case
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A representative of the Alpha Diving Technology Corporation of south Korea on June 13 opened the results of experiment conducted on the "Cheonan" case to reporters of Hangyore, SBS, Voice of People and two other media.
					 They once again gave the lie to the "results of investigation" announced by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in which it claimed the warship was sunk by a "torpedo attack of the north." 
					
					 Minju Joson Sunday observed in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The inside story about the conspiratorial farce will be brought into bolder relief as the days go by and the group of traitors will face sterner judgment of the people for having committed fraud and swindle in the eyes of the whole world. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group should confess, before being too late, to the hideous farce it orchestrated, even taking the lives of 46 innocent seamen. 
					
					 The results of the experiment conducted by civilians in the wake of the failure in the "'Cheonan diplomacy," which proved that the "results of investigation" were false, threw the group of traitors into the trap dug by it for others, the commentary noted, and went on:
					
					 The results of the experiment testify to the fact that it was very fortunate for the United Nations to have reflected in the presidential statement of the UNSC the DPRK's stand that it had nothing to do with the case of the warship sinking. Needless to say, had the UN not done so, history would have recorded one sadder event in which it is abused by the forces hostile to the DPRK including the Lee group and the U.S. and Japan egging it onto confrontation with compatriots. The UN and other international organizations had better draw a lesson from this and be vigilant against the moves of those forces against the DPRK in the future, too.
					
					 The U.S. and Japan, too, should make an apology for having staged the anti-DPRK campaign over the warship case in collusion with the Lee Myung Bak group and stop such foolish act as instigating it to confrontation with fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Cancellation of Projected Anti-DPRK War Exercises Urged
articles.content:
Cancellation of Projected Anti-DPRK War Exercises Urged
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities announced that they would stage large-scale joint naval exercises with the U.S. within July despite the strong protest at home and abroad.
					 In this regard Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a signed commentary:
					
					 The above-said exercises are a very dangerous and reckless action and a grave military provocation to the DPRK as they will harass peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinities and extremely escalate the tension there.
					
					 Citing data to prove that the warmongers' talk about "defensive exercises to cope with any provocation" is no more than sophism to cover up the dangerous nature of the projected saber-rattling and justify their scheme to ignite a war of aggression on the DPRK, the commentary further says:
					
					 However, the south Korean puppet authorities are scheming to stage the above-mentioned exercises with the U.S. at any cost in disregard of the internal and external public opinion. This only reveals their bellicose nature as a wrecker of peace in the Korean Peninsula and a maniac seeking a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 With such exercises they attempt to make up for their diplomatic failure at the UN, justify the smear campaign for confrontation with the DPRK and intensify the military pressure upon it, but it is a pipe dream. They should be aware that any anti-DPRK war exercises rendering the situation of the Korean Peninsula tense will bring nothing good to them.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should immediately cancel their plan for join naval exercises, pondering over the catastrophic consequences that the exercises may bring to the situation of the Korean Peninsula and its vicinities.

articles.title: Early Establishment of Peacekeeping Regime Called for
articles.content:
Early Establishment of Peacekeeping Regime Called for 
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- It is the firm stand and will of the DPRK to avert a war and protect peace on the Korean Peninsula and provide a sure guarantee for the global peace and security.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the DPRK Foreign Ministry proposed the parties to the Armistice Agreement that talks be held as early as possible to replace the AA with a peace treaty this year, 60 years after the outbreak of the Korean War, the article goes on:
					
					 The situation on the peninsula is inching close to an unimaginably serious phase despite the sincere efforts of the DPRK.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the situation prevailing on the peninsula is so dangerous that an accidental case may develop into an all-out war and then to a nuclear war.
					
					 The DPRK and the U.S. are still technically at war. 
					
					 The AA which had already been reduced to a dead paper provides the U.S. with conditions for starting a war in the peninsula any time. 
					
					 It is the basic way of averting such a serious development to replace the outdated AA with a peace treaty as early as possible to establish a solid peace-keeping regime on the peninsula.
					
					 In order to bring the process for the denuclearization on the peninsula back on a normal track, it is necessary to pay primary attention to building confidence between the DPRK and the U.S., the main parties concerned with the nuclear issue, and to this end it is necessary to conclude, to begin with, a peace treaty for putting an end to the state of armistice, the root cause of the hostile relations between the two countries.
					
					 The conclusion of a peace treaty is not an issue of one side giving benefit to the other side or making reward to it. 
					
					 It is a practical political issue of making something beneficial to the countries concerned including the DPRK and the U.S. and the international community and contributing to ensuring peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 If the U.S. truly stands for settling the issue of the Korean Peninsula, there will be no problem in concluding a peace treaty and the above-said process will make rapid progress. 
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to honestly respond to the DPRK's fair and aboveboard proposal for the conclusion of a peace treaty as early as possible, not insisting on its policy of "strategic patience" the weakness and absurdity of which had been brought to light in reality.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hails Completion of Taegyedo Tideland
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hails Completion of Taegyedo Tideland
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- The reclaimed Taegyedo Tideland made its imposing appearance across rough waters of the West Sea of Korea under a far-reaching plan of President Kim Il Sung and the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il. This is a great structure which clearly demonstrated that the DPRK can do anything, if it is determined. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in an editorial.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The completion of the Taegyedo Tideland reclamation project changing the map of the country helps bring about big progress in the development of the nation's agriculture and improvement of the standard of people's living and build a socialist fairyland in the vast expanse of Taegyedo area.
					
					 The completion of the project represents a miracle of Songun Korea which could be worked only by patriots and heroes boundlessly loyal to the party and the revolution. It is an exciting miracle of the 21st century which powerfully demonstrated before the whole world that there is no limit to the wisdom and talents, intellectual potential and creativity of the Korean people. 
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il's aphorism that he who says something is impossible is not speaking Korean was the steadfast faith of the builders of the Taegyedo Tideland.
					
					 The course in which the project was carried out once again proves that it is possible to work a miracle of the 21st century which others can hardly imagine and fling open the gate to a thriving nation if the Korean nation-first spirit is blended with bravery and extraordinary ideological and moral power with scientific creativity.
					
					 It is the deep-rooted faith of all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK that it is possible to work undying miracles of Songun Korea and open the gate to a thriving nation when they remain loyal to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There is nothing impossible for them and no fortress unconquerable when they live and work in the same spirit and traits as displayed by the builders of the tideland in building a structure of eternal value by damming off the rough waters of the West Sea. 
					
					 The editorial calls on all the servicepersons and people to make redoubled efforts as required by the stirring era of great surge when world-startling events are taking place one after another, increase the speed of the general offensive to the maximum and thus glorify the conference of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 65th founding anniversary as great festivals of victors and fly the banner of victory on the eminence of a thriving nation at an early date.

articles.title: Actions against "Improving Four Big Rivers" Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions against "Improving Four Big Rivers" Unabated in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Actions against the project of "improving four big rivers" have been staged unabated in different parts of south Korea, according to CBS of south Korea on July 16.
					At least 17,000 Buddhists published a declaration on the situation opposing the project on July 15 and launched into full-dressed actions.
					
					 Catholics in Yangphyong County, Kyonggi Province have held masses every day to have the project stopped. 
					
					 South Kyongsang Province has flatly rejected participation in the project while South Chungchong Province formed the "Special Committee for Reexamination of the Kum River Project" and started overall investigation.

articles.title: Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Various Countries
articles.content:
Solidarity with Korean People Expressed in Various Countries
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- A friendly labor took place in Cuba and films shows in Ethiopia from June 30 to July 13 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The participants of the film shows watched "Reply of Korea" and other Korean films.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 A director of the Ministry of Health and other personages of Ethiopia said that the strong military capabilities of the DPRK play an important role in confrontation with the U.S., the DPRK is a powerful country and the Korean people's high self-respect and ardent patriotism have been recognized by the world.
					
					 They praised the Songun politics pursued by leader Kim Jong Il, saying that if the DPRK had failed to build up the nuclear deterrent by its own efforts, it would not have taken so hard-line stand in the showdown with the U.S.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Highly Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Highly Praised
						
 Pyongyang, July 19 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held in Peru, Democratic Congo, Denmark and Nigeria and by the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America, a ceremony of opening book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Mexico and remembrance meetings and film shows in Nepal, Ukraine and Indonesia between July 6 and 10 to commemorate the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display in their venues were photos on the revolutionary career of the President and the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il, works of peerlessly great persons, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handiworks associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films "Reply of Korea" and "The Tower of the Juche Idea".
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland" said that Kim Il Sung's boundless love and devotion to the people were the sources of every rapid progress and development in socialist Korea and the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses.
					
					 The chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo referred in detail to the fact that the President rendered unreserved support to the African people in their efforts for building a new society.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico said that the whole life of the President was that of a great man and a great revolutionary, stressing that he will always live in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the progressive people of the world.
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association expressed conviction that the Korean people will surly emerge victorious in the drive to build a thriving socialist nation, true to the behests of the President.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the remembrance meetings in Denmark and Nepal.

articles.title: Sur de Corea debe confesar la verdad del caso de "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Sur de Corea debe confesar la verdad del caso de "Cheonan"
						
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ATCC) -- El dia 13, el representante de la Corporacion de Tecnologia de Buceo Alpha del Sur de Corea publico el resultado de sus experimentos realizados para esclarecer la causa de hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan" ante los reporteros de 5 medios de prensa incluyendo "Hangyore", "SBS" y "Voz del Pueblo".
					  De esta manera, volvio a revelarse lo fraudulento del "resultado de investigacion" de la banda de traidores surcoreanos que atribuye el citado caso al "ataque de torpedo norcoreano".
					
					  Con el paso de los dias, quedara cada vez mas revelado el secreto de esa farsa y la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak sera condenada al castigo mas duro de la nacion por haber enganado a todo el mundo.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 18 y continua:
					
					  Por lo tanto, la banda del traidor Lee debera confesar, aunque tardiamente, su crimen de haber orquestado esa gran farsa sacrificando a 46 soldados inocentes.
					
					  La publicacion del resultado de los experimentos realizados por un especialista civil ha sido otro golpe sufrido por los traidores surcoreanos tras su fracasada "diplomacia en torno al caso del 'Cheonan'". Asi que ellos quedaron mas empantanados en la trampa tendida por si mismos.
					
					  El resultado del especialista civil comprueba que fue afortunado que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU haya anotado en la declaracion de su presidente la posicion de la RPDC de que no tiene nada que ver con el caso de hundimiento del "Cheonan".
					
					  Si ese organismo internacional hubiera actuado al contrario, habria sido registrado sin falta en la historia otro caso de abuso de la ONU por parte de EE.UU., Japon y otras fuerzas hostiles a la RPDC.
					
					  La ONU y otras organizaciones internacionales deberan sacar la leccion de este caso y seguir tomando precaucion de las maniobras de las fuerzas hostiles a la RPDC.
					
					  EE.UU. y Japon deben pedir disculpas por sus campanas intrigantes anti-RPDC desarrolladas en contubernio con la banda de Lee Myung Bak bajo el pretexto del incidente del "Cheonan" y dejar de instigar a la banda de Lee a la confrontacion fratricida.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena al traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena al traidor Lee Myung Bak 
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ATCC) -- El dia 12, el  traidor Lee Myung Bak, que hablaba tanto de que la dilacion del "traslado del mando de las operaciones en el tiempo de guerra" es la "opcion real e independiente", dijo que "tambien en Europa la OTAN dirigida por el comandante de las tropas norteamericanas deviene la base fundamental para la seguridad de la region" y que "hay que entender tambien el asunto del mando de las operaciones en el tiempo de guerra desde el punto de vista de la seguridad para el Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo".
					  Esto no pasa de ser sofisma del servidor a las grandes potencias y traidor a la nacion.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 18 y continua:
					
					   El alboroto de los titeres surcoreanos tendentes a dilatar el "traslado del mando de las operaciones en el tiempo de guerra" por parte de Estados Unidos no es una "opcion independiente" sino no pasa de ser un regateo sumiso para mantener el poder vendiendo la dignidad e intereses de la poblacion surcoreana a las fuerzas foraneas y un producto de la peligrosa intriga para provocar la guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea bajo el amparo de las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					  El traidor Lee Myung Bak tomo por ejemplo la OTAN para justificar tal dilacion.
					
					  Francia, Alemania y otros paises miembros de la OTAN ejercen de manera independiente el mando de los ejercitos de sus paises.
					
					  En este mundo hay muchos paises y naciones. Pero, solo el  Sur de Corea entrego el mando de su ejercito a otro pais.
					
					  El gobernante surcoreano no podra encubrir con nada su naturaleza proyanqui y traidora revelada a traves de la dilacion del "traslado del mando de las operaciones en el tiempo de guerra".
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas deben actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de que el servilismo a las grandes potencias y la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras son el camino de la desverguenza y la derrota.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun demanda cancelar plan de ejercicio militar anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun demanda cancelar plan de ejercicio militar anti-RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ATCC) -- Pese al fuerte rechazo y condena de los nacionales y extranjeros, las autoridades titeres surcoreanas anunciaron que desarrollaran dentro del mes en curso junto con Estados Unidos el ejercicio conjunto maritimo de gran envergadura.
					  En un comentario individual del dia 19, el periodico Rodong Sinmun lo califico de acto muy peligroso, que destruye la paz y la seguridad y agrava al maximo la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno, y de grave provocacion militar contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Los belicistas hablan de que el ejercicio en cuestion es el "defensivo" para hacer frente a la supuesta provocacion. Pero, este sofisma sirve solo para encubrir la peligrosidad del ejercicio maritimo y justificar sus acciones tendentes a provocar la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC, comienza el comentarista y continua:
					
					  Los titeres surcoreanos tratan de librar a toda costa ese ejercicio en contubernio con EE.UU. desoyendo la opinion publica interna y externa. Esto revela mas su naturaleza de destructor de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y maniaco de la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.
					
					  Mediante esa maniobra militar, las autoridades surcoreanas pretenden absurdamente reparar su fracaso diplomatico sufrido en la ONU, justificar los alborotos de enfrentamiento e intriga contra la RPDC y fortalecer la presion militar a esta. Ellas deben saber correctamente que la consiguiente tension de la Peninsula Coreana no les conviene en ningun sentido.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas deben revocar de inmediato su plan de ejercicio maritimo meditando en las consecuencias catastroficas que tendra este entrenamiento para la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y sus periferias.

articles.title: Se efectuan torneos de futbol entre los equipos de Corea y China
articles.content:
Se efectuan torneos de futbol entre los equipos de Corea y China
						
Pyongyang, 19 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar los dias 15 y 18 en el capitalino Campo de Futbol Yanggakdo los partidos entre la seleccion nacional juvenil de Corea y la de China.
					En ambos encuentros Corea gano a China por 2:1 y 6:2, respectivamente.
					
					Ambos equipos participaran en el Campeonato Asiatico de Futbol Sub-19 2010 a efectuarse en China en octubre que viene. 
					
					Corea pertenece al grupo B con Irak, Uzbekistan y Bahrein.
					
					Con anterioridad, el equipo visitante jugo el dia 12 con el equipo coreano Mangyongbong y perdio por 2:1.
